CryEngineModule(CryScriptSystem PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine")
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE lua)
if (WIN32)
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE shell32 Gdi32 wininet Ole32)
endif()

if (ANDROID)

endif()
